page.title: 08Recreation _ a new craze.
page.content: A new craze throughout the world is Break Dancing.Lots of people who Break Dance are good but some people are pathetic.It is a craze that strted in America .It worked it's way around the World and it is dying out.It has started to out in 1985 .Lots of people in England are Break Dancing.To Break dance you move your arms and legs like a robot or you can move your body like a wave.You can move your feet from side to side , you can spin on your head and back.To spin on your head you need to do a head stand and push yourself round with your hands.
